action.action-desc: Mr. Chambliss (for himself and Mr. Isakson) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To expand the boundary of Fort Frederica National Monument in the State of Georgia, and for other purposes.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act of 2014
.

paragraph.text: The boundary of the Fort Frederica National Monument in the State of Georgia is modified to include the land generally depicted as Proposed Acquisition Areas on the map entitled Fort Frederica National Monument Proposed Boundary Expansion, numbered 369/127,249, and dated November 2014.
The map described in paragraph (1) shall be on file and available for public inspection in the appropriate offices of the National Park Service.
The Secretary of the Interior may acquire the land and interests in land described in paragraph (1) by donation or purchase with donated or appropriated funds from willing sellers only.
